page.title: 03ART AND CRAFT-PAINTING
page.content: {Cornwall is a popular place}for artists.Its the light that is right for painting and if you go anywhere in Cornwall its usually quiet and peacefull and is not dusty. But there are not many artists in St. Merryn.We interviewed{Mrs Bourdeaux}a local artist about her paintings.She is married with 3 children and has lived locally for about 14 years.She began to paint commercially in 1975 {.She sells}her paintings in the Newsagent's in the St.Merryn village and at Mid-Cornwall Galleries in Par. Mrs Bourdeaux uses{water colours and {acrylic paints}to paint{wildlife. She has time to paint in the mornings and evenings when her children aren't with her.
